pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cluster Evaluation // CLUster Evaluation (CLUE) is a computational method for identifying optimal number of clusters in a given time-course dataset clustered by cmeans or kmeans algorithms and subsequently identify key kinases or pathways from each cluster. Its implementation in R is called ClueR. See Readme on https://github.com/PengyiYang/ClueR for more details.
